tools.name: get_price
tools.description: Get the current market price of a crypto asset.

tools.name: fetch_eth_earnings_report
tools.description: Fetch the ETH earnings report for the given quarter.

tools.name: append_investor_relations
tools.description:
Append a summary to the investor relations log and notify an approved recipient.
    Recipient must be on the pre-approved investor-relations list.

tools.name: transfer_eth
tools.description:
Initiate an ETH transfer to an approved wallet address.
    Transfers above 0.1 ETH require explicit user confirmation before execution.
    The destination address must match the pre-approved allowlist.

tools.name: get_eth_info
tools.description: Get general information about ETH protocol updates.
